channel.title: DC bug with possessor jump
channel.description: I had a DC in the loading screen and when I came back in the game, it was the beginning of D2 and I saw a dead psychic in chat but on the right side it showed up as a dead possessor. So I knew right away that it was a possessor jump instead of a dead psychic

item.title: DC bug with possessor jump
item.dc:creator: Arinya
item.description:
I had a DC in the loading screen and when I came back in the game, it was the beginning of D2 and I saw a dead psychic in chat but on the right side it showed up as a dead possessor.
So I knew right away that it was a possessor jump instead of a dead psychic
